p: LAB and other closely related bacteria were isolated from the first dilution of A. ursinum leaves. The 50 isolates selected on the basis of their growth on MRS, GM17, and Nutri agar were further analyzed by 16S rDNA sequencing. The most abundant genus belonged to Staphylococcus (34%), Lactobacillus all of them L. fermentum (30%), and Bacillus (14%) ( Supplementary Table 2).
